text: I often complain about podcasts that hide their "RSS" feed. It's only fair to call out one for doing it well. Here's a new podcast from WNYC. Over on the left, impossible to miss, is a Subscribe button. Click it, and see a list of choices, one of which is via RSS. It links to the podcast feed, ready to subscribe to, which I have done in "podcatch.com".
description: I often complain about podcasts that hide their "RSS" feed. It's only fair to call out one for doing it well.
